en.inviteHeader: Invite your colleagues to collaborate with you
en.sentText: You can now make your colleagues do your work.
en.tutorialStartText: Workspaces are a place for you to share work with co-workers, allowing them to be on the same page as you
en.tutorialAddEmailText: Enter someone's email and click the 'add' button
en.tutorialAddMoreText:
You can add as many coworkers as you want, just enter another email and click the add button, once you're done click the invite button.
The more people you add the more work you can delegate to them!
